message.entry: Manage file and folder exclusions from the right click menu.
Add a single file: browse to the file and click "Add Source Folders". All other files in this folder will be excluded from the analysis.
Change location of a source folder by selecting the folder and "Modify Path" from the toolbar.

Update folders and contents: from the Project Browser select a folder and right click to "Refresh Source Folder"
in order to update the latest folder content.

Original configuration was renamed or deleted. Using active configuration...
Use letters(A-Z, a-z) and numbers (0-9) only.
Target name mcpu can not be used.
Target {0} is currently in use in other configurations.

The endianness defines byte order within a word and word order within a long integer.
"Big endian" architectures place the most significant byte first.
Specify the type char as 'unsigned' or 'signed', or choose the target's default behavior for the type.
Short or alignment cannot be 8-bit if char is 16-bit.

The alignment of some basic types with array/structures is configurable
(depending on the compiler implementation or optimization options).
For example, when the alignment of basic types within array/struct is always 8,
it implies that the storage assigned to arrays and structures is strictly determined
by the size of the individual data objects (without members and end padding).
